title: Cross Account Private API Access via Public Network Load Balancer

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample pattern allows users from one account to access their Private REST APIs present in same/cross account over the internet.

This facilitates abstraction of network resources (like load balancers, virtual private clouds, endpoints) & application resources (like lambda, api gateway) into separate individual management accounts.
